page.title: 11The Boat Trip Round Lundy.
page.content: On Wednesday we went on a boat trip around the island.We split up into two groups.I went with Mrs.Dench's group. She went first on the boat.Mr.Hanks took twelve boys to Rat Island to see some divers.Before we went around the island we had to get on a little boat (six at a time)to get on a bigger boat.When the twelve of us were on the boat we started to go.We saw lots of Guillemots and Razor Bills.There was a wrecked ship and it was rusty.It was only part of a boat because the rest of it had been washed somewhere.There was a Kittiwake following us but when we got faster it couldn't keep up. We had to go fast to go round the corner and around some rocks.We saw about ten seals, two or three were sitting on rocks.We waved to one of the seals and it looked like it waved back with his tail! (continued)
